front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Ethernet Amendment: Physical Layer and Management Parameters for Power over Data Lines (PoDL) of Single Balanced Twisted Pair Ethernet

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2015 adds specifications and management parameters for the provision of power via a single twisted pair to connected Data Terminal Equipment (DTE) with IEEE 802.3 single balanced twisted-pair interfaces.
